name: My Las Vegas Fling with a Bombshell Bodybuilder
name_original: My Las Vegas Fling with a Bombshell Bodybuilder
description:
My Las Vegas Fling with a Bombshell Bodybuilder is a dating sim style visual novel that allows the player to develop professional, and not-so-professional, relationships as they serve as a stand-in coach for a world-renowned bodybuilding team at an international competition.  

The game features five leading ladies that you get to know over the span of a week in the fabulous Las Vegas as well as in the team's vacation home outside of the city limits.

The Voices in Your Head Edition of the game is a build without any of the final art.
